Detailed Description

In the namespace mgGDL, usefule display functions are defined.

Originally mgGDL is inteded not to depend on OpenGL. That is, if function body is exchanged to other implemetation than OpenGL, users of mgGDL are not affected.

Function Documentation

void mgGDL::draw_surface_curvature ( const mgTLDataVector &  tldvec,
MGCL::SURFACE_CURVATURE_KIND  kind,
double  lower,
double  upper,
double *  real_lower = 0,
double *  real_upper = 0 
)

Renders curvatures mapping that comes into colorful image.

A point whose curvature is within [lower, upper], the color varies.

Parameters:
upper minimum and maximum value of the curvatures of the kind. Whne lower>=upper, lower is set as the minimum value and upper is set as the maximum value out of all the curvatures.
real_lower When not null, minimum curvature of the kind will be output.
real_upper When not null, maximum curvature of the kind will be output.

MGDECL void mgGDL::MGDrawArrow ( MGPosition  pos[4]  ) 

Draw an arrow symbol with implementation of OpenGL.

pos[0] is the origin of the arrow, pos[1] is the top of the arrow, pos[2], [3] are two bottoms of arrowhead.

MGDECL void mgGDL::MGDrawArrow ( const MGCurve &  curve,
int  ndiv 
)

Draw arrow symbols of curve with implementation of OpenGL.

ndiv is the number of arrows for the curve.

MGDECL void mgGDL::MGDrawArrow ( const MGFSurface &  surf,
int  udiv,
int  vdiv 
)

Draw arrow symbols of curve with implementation of OpenGL.

arrows of udiv*vdiv are displyed on the surface.

MGDECL void mgGDL::MGDrawPointSeq ( const MGBPointSeq &  bp,
bool  draw_points = true,
bool  dotted = true 
)

Draw a control polygon.

Lines can be drawn between point[i-1] and point[i], for i=1, ..., length()-1.

Parameters:
bp input point sequence.
draw_points True if points be drawn.
dotted true if dotted lines be drawn.
MGDECL void mgGDL::MGDrawPointSeq ( const MGSPointSeq &  sp,
bool  draw_points = true,
bool  dotted = true 
)

Draw control polygon network.

Lines can be drawn between sp(i,j,.).

Parameters:
draw_points True if points be drawn.
dotted true if dotted lines be drawn.
MGDECL void mgGDL::MGDrawPolyline ( const MGBPointSeq &  line,
bool  closed = false 
)

Draw a polyline using openGL functions.

These three functions do not set the line attributes. So, if necessary, line attrubutes must be set before invoking the functions. When cloded=true, 1st and last points will be connected.

void mgGDL::setup_easy_shade (  ) 

OpenGL declaration for shading.

setup_easy_shade calls the follows: 1. glEnable for GL_LIGHT0, GL_LIGHTING, GL_COLOR_MATERIAL. 2. glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL) 3. glLightModeli(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_TWO_SIDE, GL_TRUE) 4. glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);/// 両面を描画 5. glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK) for GL_AMBIENT & GL_DIFFUSE.

void mgGDL::setup_wire_drawing (  ) 

OpenGL declaration for shading.

setup_wire_drawing calls the follows: glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);/// ライトをオフ glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);/// ライティングオフ glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_LINE);/// ワイヤーフレームを描画
